## ciliumctl kvstore get

Retrieve a key

```
ciliumctl kvstore get [options] <key> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
cilium kvstore get --recursive foo
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for get
  -o, --output string   json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
      --recursive       Recursive lookup
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string     Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug             Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string       URI to server-side API
      --kvstore string    Key-Value Store type
      --kvstore-opt map   Key-Value Store options
```

* [ciliumctl kvstore](ciliumctl_kvstore.md)	 - Direct access to the kvstore
